jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Company Description
 SynapseCraft++ is the world‚Äôs first Cognitive AI Operating System designed to make intelligent workflows explainable, modular, and secure. Unlike black-box AI tools, SynapseCraft++ enables developers, researchers, and innovators to build and observe autonomous reasoning safely, privately, and locally. Our mission is to redefine how intelligence is built, audited, and trusted. SynapseCraft++ provides a foundation for the next era of intelligent systems by enabling transparent reasoning with human-in-the-loop control.
 Role Description
 This is a full-time on-site role for a Software Engineer located in New Delhi. The Software Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining back-end applications. The role involves programming, implementing object-oriented programming (OOP) principles, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance the cognitive AI infrastructure. Additionally, the Software Engineer will participate in code reviews, debugging, and performance optimization tasks.
 Qualifications
 Strong knowledge of Computer Science principlesExperience in Back-End Web Development and Software DevelopmentProficiency in Programming and implementing Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principlesExcellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work within a teamFamiliarity with AI and cognitive systems is a plusBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

jobs.title: Software Developer (Devices), India
jobs.description:
At AlgoSec, What you do matters!

Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on-premises networks.

Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.

We are hiring an experienced Software Developer to join a highly dynamic R&D environment, and take part in creating the new architecture of AlgoSec products and design complicated systems.

Reporting to: R&D Team Lead

Location: Gurgaon, India

Direct employment

Responsibilities

Devices team is responsible for the lowest layer of AlgoSec's products, focusing of integrating and interfacing various networking security products (mainly firewalls and routers) and modeling their configuration and topology into the AlgoSec unified model. This includes working with various vendors APIs , technologies, and models.Own processes E2E, while dealing with complicated issues and crafting innovative solutions

Requirements

B.Sc. in Computer Sciences/Engineering from a known university.5 years of experience in software development.Experience in server-side software development.Experience in Linux/UNIX environments.Experience in Java 8 or higher, Spring, SQL.Team player, pleasant person to work with, high level of integrity.Very bright, fast learner, independent and organized.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.Good to have proven experience working with LLMs, AI tools and techniques.

Advantages

Experience with Perl, Python, Ruby, Lua or similarExperience in networking, routing protocols, firewallsExperience with microservices, container deployment and management

AlgoSec is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO), committed to creating a friendly, diverse and inclusive company culture.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
jobs.description:
Company Description
Microsharp Technologies is a growing software solutions and digital services company dedicated to helping businesses streamline operations, improve customer engagement, and achieve growth through technology. We specialize in developing custom software applications, mobile apps, and web platforms, along with providing digital marketing and IT consulting services..

 Role Description
 
This is a full-time hybrid role for a Mobile App Developer (Flutter) located in Bengaluru with some work from home flexibility. The Mobile App Developer will be responsible for developing mobile applications using the Flutter framework. Daily tasks include designing, coding, and testing applications, integrating with back-end systems, and ensuring the performance and responsiveness of applications. The role also involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and design new features, troubleshooting issues, and maintaining code quality.

 Qualifications
 
Software Development and Programming skillsExperience with DatabasesProficiency in Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and front-end technologiesIntegration skills, including connecting mobile applications with APIs and other back-end servicesStrong problem-solving and debugging skillsExcellent understanding of mobile application development best practicesBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fieldExperience with Flutter framework and Dart programming languageGood communication and teamwork skills

jobs.title: flutter developer
jobs.description:
Company Description
 
BELL & RING TECH NIRMAN Pvt. Ltd. is a Kochi, Kerala-based cutting-edge technology startup that excels in developing robust apps from concept to completion, while ensuring they reach the intended audience through our professional marketing efforts. Our in-house development team focuses on building smooth, scalable, and usable digital products, while our seasoned marketing team is committed to achieving maximum visibility, engagement, and growth. Even though we are a startup in the pre-launch phase, we are driven by a solid vision: to make technology easy for businesses and people by designing effective apps that address tangible real-world challenges.

 Role Description
 
This is a full-time on-site role for a Flutter Developer located in Kochi. The Flutter Developer will be responsible for designing and developing high-performance mobile applications using the Flutter framework. Daily tasks include coding, testing, debugging, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the production of high-quality, scalable apps. The role also involves staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to integrate them into our development processes.

 Qualifications
 
Strong skills in Computer Science and ProgrammingExperience in Back-End Web Development and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)Proficiency in Software Development methodologies and best practicesExcellent problem-solving and analytical skillsStrong teamwork and communication skillsAbility to work independently and manage time effectivelyBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fieldPrevious experience in mobile app development using Flutter is a plus

jobs.title: Trainee Decision Scientist
jobs.description:
Job Title: Trainee Decision ScientistExperience: 3‚Äì5 yearsLocation: BangaloreEmployment Type: Full-Time OverviewOur client ‚Äì one of the largest data science companies ‚Äì is seeking to hire a Trainee Decision Scientist.  
Roles & ResponsibilitiesTake actions to ensure healthy growth of the engagement ‚Äì with focus on high quality delivery and client relationshipsCollaborate with the client services team to assess and take decisions regarding the health of theengagementWork with your team to solve complex problems. Typically, these business problems cannot be solved using a linear/single line of thought. Use first principle thinking, coupled with basics of math and technology to arrive at a robust solution design, while collaborating with the others in the team Provide support for projects in areas ranging from: core data engineering, design architecture, cloud capabilities to mathematical model building, evaluation, and operational supportWe have an open work culture, and we encourage sharing of ideas. You would see yourself sharing ideas and participating in discussions with team members across teams. You would be dealing with problems from team members, direct reports and superiors from various backgrounds and experiences. Collaborate with the various business functions, like Sales, Marketing, Talent Management and Delivery & Innovation, helping them from your experiences in delivery, and learning their way of operating, in returnThe workday stretches into late evenings and you would find yourself talking to the client, presenting insights from work and engaging the clients in discussions around growth and future pipeline development. You would have to work on defining this pipeline and ensuring growth is driven by great delivery and satisfactory client engagementIn short, a day would involve delivery ‚Äì be it brainstorming on a project, QCing codes on Python/R/SAS or whatever technology it takes, preparing a deck for delivering insights and growth, collaborating with the India Leadership to come up with new ideas and solution design, driving client conversations centered around growth and guiding team members across the lifecycle of the engagement
Skills & CompetenciesPossess strong analytical/logical thinking skills and clarity of thought to identify and solve business problemsAbility to learn complex businesses very quickly, define problems accurately while paying attention to detail in the solutionGood to have experience in Excel, VBA/Macros, SQL, SAS/R Competency and interest in Business Technology, both academically and professionally, is preferredAbility to extract and analyze data from multiple sources using analytical toolsAbility to manage and multi-task under tight deadlinesStrong interpersonal and communication skillsDemonstrated leadership within or outside a work setting. You should be someone who frequently takes initiative and is eager to break new ground Preferable Qualities - Ready to take ownership of multiple applications - Ready to stretch beyond normal hours during build and high support activity times
Preferred QualificationsGraduated B.E/ B.Tech/ MBA/ MSB.E & B.Tech >4 yearsMBA & MS >3 years

From advanced search and AI-driven products to mobile platforms, cloud solutions, and cutting-edge applications, it is dedicated to solving some of the world‚Äôs most complex challenges. With a culture of innovation and collaboration, it provides engineers the opportunity to work on scalable systems, artificial intelligence, distributed computing, machine learning, and more. The organization is known for revolutionizing how people connect, explore, and interact with information‚Äîshaping the future of technology, one breakthrough at a time.
About the RoleAs a Software Engineer, you will work on high-impact projects that extend and improve next-generation technologies. You‚Äôll design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain scalable software solutions while collaborating with teams across diverse domains. This role provides the flexibility to switch between teams and projects, offering an environment of constant learning, problem-solving, and innovation.
Key ResponsibilitiesResearch, design, and develop software applications that improve product offerings and user experiences.Work on projects involving artificial intelligence, natural language processing, data compression, machine learning, and large-scale system design.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address scalability, storage, and access challenges.Contribute innovative ideas to improve systems and products across the technology stack.Test, deploy, and maintain high-performance software systems in dynamic environments.

Preferred QualificationsAdvanced degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field.Exposure to large-scale applications, security, UI design, or mobile platforms.Strong problem-solving ability, adaptability, and eagerness to learn.

jobs.title: Founder's Office
jobs.description:
About us: Viral Labs is a distribution consultancy firm for the best consumer apps on earth. We understand that virality is not luck. It is inputs, systems, and taste. We treat virality like science and deploy it at scale to shape what millions see. Clients include Flo, Polymarket, Lululemon.
Your Role: Be the founder‚Äôs bandwidth multiplier. Own high leverage projects and the unglamorous tasks that keep momentum high.
Apply if:You want to run your own company one day and want a real apprenticeship.You want to learn how an export-led services company is built end to end.You want to learn sales to top 1% companies.You want to see how an industry leading company is built.You are okay working 7 days a week, be in person in Koramangala, attend calls at nights / weekends (US Timezone).
Tasks you have to manage:
Company-wide OKRs. Turn quarterly goals into concrete KRs, projects, and tickets. Keep a single source of truth dashboard, run monthly and weekly reviews, call out slippage early, and make sure every KR has a plan, an owner, and dates that hold.
Follow-up and task hygiene. Build a daily follow-up rhythm with D-1 nudges, day-of confirmations, and post-deadline escalations. Your default is persistent and precise. Nothing falls through the cracks. Every task has an owner, a due date, and a visible status.
Meetings and minutes. You will accompany the founder on all key calls. Before each call, prepare a one page brief with context, objectives, and open questions. During the call, capture decisions and actions. Within 60 minutes, convert minutes into tickets, assign owners and dates, share a crisp recap, and pre-schedule next steps.
Founder leverage. Guard the calendar, protect deep work blocks, and remove admin friction fast. That includes errands, bookings, vendor follow ups, paperwork, and office ops. Your job is to keep the founder‚Äôs bandwidth free for strategy, sales, and relationships.
Special projects. Stand up new motions when needed: creator supply programs, multi-account campaigns, partnerships, events, and US market pushes. Build from messy to repeatable.
Talent Sourcing. Build a hiring engine to attract top 1% talent. Write sharp JDs, define scorecards, source A players, run structured interviews, close candidates, and own onboarding.
Who are you?High agency.Zero ego on unglamorous work.Doesn't take no for an answer.Curious individual and a first-principles thinker.Want to be in a high growth environment.1 to 3 years in experience in founder‚Äôs office, growth, ops or similar roles.

jobs.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
jobs.description:
Position Title: Analyst ‚Äì Business Intelligence, GIC SC AnalyticsJob ID: RF469Location: Mumbai, IndiaWork Mode: HybridExperience Required: 0 ‚Äì 1.5 YearsShift Timing: 1:30 pm ‚Äì 10:30 pmEmployment Type: Full Time
About the CompanyA global leader in the food industry with over 150 years of history, serving consumers across 100+ countries with iconic brands. The India Global Capability Center (GIC), located in Mumbai, supports worldwide operations in Supply Chain, Finance, HR, Digital & Technology, Consumer Insights, R&D & Quality, and Enterprise Business Services. With a workforce of 1,800+ professionals, the center delivers innovation, operational excellence, and sustainable value, while fostering inclusion, equity, and growth.
About the Role:This entry-level role is designed to support data extraction, transformation, and integration processes while contributing to the development and maintenance of business intelligence (BI) solutions. The role involves delivering accurate project tasks on time, performing basic analysis and validation, and collaborating effectively with stakeholders. You will also gain foundational knowledge of supply chain principles and KPIs to enhance data-driven decision-making.
Key Responsibilities:Perform ETL (extract, transform, load) from multiple sources such as GCP, SQL, AFO, and SAP ERP for low-complexity projects.Write SQL and BigQuery scripts for data manipulation and analysis.Develop and maintain BI solutions, including tools, automation, and visualizations.Conduct basic data analysis and ensure accuracy and consistency of deliverables.Collaborate with data engineers and senior team members to refne data models.Execute project tasks on time and communicate risks proactively.Build basic knowledge of supply chain processes and KPIs to drive better solutions.
Minimum Requirements:Bachelor‚Äôs degree from an accredited university (mandatory).0‚Äì1.5 years of experience in data development, analysis, or visualization.Strong knowledge of ETL, SQL/BigQuery, and data visualization best practices.Proficiency in GCP, Advanced Excel, Tableau, and SQL Server.Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Preferred Qualifications:Master‚Äôs degree in Engineering or related field.1+ years of relevant experience.Professional certifications in SQL, GCP, Tableau, or Excel.Basic understanding of Supply Chain or the CPG industry.
Skills: SQL, BigQuery, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Tableau, Advanced Excel, Data Visualization, ETL, Supply Chain Analytics
